title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-1.8 - Defective boilers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-1.8 - Defective boilers

State Regulations
A boiler showing any defect affecting its safety, shall
be immediately discontinued from service and the Department of Labor and the
insuring company shall be notified. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-1.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
